verses.content: Jakob chu a pa khuolchâmna Kanaan rama chun a um tah a.

Hieng hi Jakob thlahai chu an nih: Josef chu kum sâwmpasari a niin a uhai, a pa nuhmeihai Bilha le Zilpah naupasalhai leh ran ruol an inthlah a. Josef chun an suol thukhawchâng chu a pa kuomah ân tlun a.
Chun, Israel chun Josef chu a tar tieng nau a ni leiin a nauhai po po nêk chun a hmangai lem a; chuongchun, zakawfuol rawng tamtaka ṭiel a siempêk a.
An pa chun ama chu a uhai po po nêkin a hmangai lem ti a unauhaiin an hriet chun ama chu an theida ta hleh a, ṭawngbau ṭha hrim a chungah an rawl thei ta nawh a.
Chun, Josef chun mang a nei a, a uhai kuoma a hril chun ama chu an theida zuol tah a.
Ama chun an kuomah, “Lungin- siettakin ka mang thu hi lo ngai ro:
ngai ta u, loa hin buphalhai ei lo intêl a, ngai ta u, ka buphal chu a hung tho a, a ngîr ta a; in buphalhai chun an hung inhuol a, ka buphal chu chibai an bûk tâwl a,” a tih a.

A uhai chun a kuomah, “Nang tehin kan chungah ro i rêl vei ding maw? Nang tehin kan chungah thu i nei vei ding maw?” an tih a. Chuong- chun, a mang lei le a thuhril lei chun ama chu an theida nâwk zuol det a.
Chun, mang dang a nei nâwk a, a uhai chu a hril nâwk a, “Ngai ta u, mang ka nei nâwk a, nisa, thla le arasi sâwmpakhat khin chibai an mi lo bûk chu tie,” a tih a.
Chun, a pa chu a hril a, a uhai khawm; chun, a pa chun a kâwk a, a kuomah, “Mang i nei hi ieng mang am a ni lie? Kei le i nu le i uhai hin hnuoi sikin chibai kan bûk hlak ding che am a nih?” a tih a.
Chun, a uhai chun ama chu an îtthîk a, a pa ruok chun a thuhril chu lungrilin a vawn zing a.
Chun, a uhai chu Sekema chun an pa ran ruol chu inthlain an feh a.
Israel chun Josef kuomah, “I uhaiin Sekemah a ni maw ran ruol chu an inthla? hung ta, an kuomah tir ka ti che,” a tih a. Ama chun, “Mi tir ta la,” a tih a.

A pa chun a kuomah, “I uhai an dam am, ran ruol khawm an dam am va en la, an chanchin mi hung hril nâwk rawh aw,” a tih a. Chuongchun, Hebron ruoma inthawk chun a tir suok a; ama chun Sekem chu a va tlung tah a.
Chun, mi tuin amanih phûla ân vâk ân vâk lai chun a hmuh a; chuongchun, mi chun, “Iengam i zawng leh?” tiin ân dawn a.
Ama chun, “Ka uhai ka zawng a nih: lunginsiettakin ran ruol an inthlâna chu mi hril ta khai,” a tih a.
Mi chun, “Hitaka inthawkin an suok kha tie, ‘Dothanah fêng ei tiu,’ an ti chu ka hriet,” a tih a. Chun, Josef chun a uhai chu a hnawt a, Dothana chun a va hmuh a.
Anni chun hlataka inthawkin an lo hmuh a, an kâwl hnai a tlung hmain ama thatna ding thu an lo rawt tah a.
“En ta u, mang neipa a hung saw.
Thaw ro, that ei ta, khur pakhatah thlâk ei tiu khai; chun, ‘Sain a se tah,’ ei ti el ding annâwm: chuongchun, a manghai chu ieng- tin am a um hre el ei tih,” an inti tâwl a.
Reuben ruok chun chu chu a lo hrietin an kuta inthawk chun a sansuok a, “A that êm chu that nâwng ei tiu,” a tih a.

Reuben bawk chun a pa kuoma ṭhuoi nâwkna dinga an kuta inthawk chu a sansuok theina dingin, an kuoma chun, “Thisen chu insuo naw ro, thlalêra khura hin thlâk unla, kut chu a chunga hin thlâk naw ro,” a tih a.
Chun, Josef chun a uhai kuom a va tlung chun, ama chu a zakawfuol rawng tamtaka ṭiel a ihâk chu an lo hlîppêk a;
an ṭhuoi a, khurah an thlâk tah a: khur chu a ruok tui um nawna a nih.
Chun, bu fa dingin an hang ṭhung tâwl a; chun, an hang dâk a, Ismael inzinpâwl Gileada inthawk an sanghâwngseia riminhnik, thing hnai damdawi le murra phura Aiguptaa zu fe ding hunghai chu an hmuh a.
Chun, Juda chun a unauhai kuomah, “Ei sang ei that a, a thisen suok ei ip chun iengam ṭhathnemna um a ta?
Thaw ro, a chungah kut thlâk loin Ismael mihai kuoma sawn zawr el lem ei tiu; ama hi ei sang, ei tisa ngei a ni sih a,” a tih a. A unauhai chun a thu chu an zâwm tah a.

Chun, Midian mihai sumdâwng an hung a; chuongchun, Josef chu khura inthawk chu an khai suok a, Ismael mihai kuoma chun Josef chu tangka sawmhniin an zawr tah a, anni chun Josef chu Aiguptaah an ṭhuoi tah a.
Reuben chu khura chun a hung kîra Josef chu khurah a lo um ta nawh ti a hmu chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a,
chun, a sanghai kuom tieng a kîr nâwk a, “Bawipu kha a um ta nawh, kei hi khaw tieng am fe tâng ka ti leh aw?” a tih a.
Chun, Josef zakawfuol chu an lâk a, kêlchal an thata a thia chun zakawfuol chu an inchieh a.
Chun, zakawfuol chu an inphur a, an pa kuoma chun an hung chawi a, a kuomah, “Hi hi kan hmu ringawt a, i naupa zakawfuol a ni am a ni naw en ta,” an tih a.
Ama chun a lo hriet el a, “Ka naupa zakawfuol a ni hi, sahrângin a se tah a ni hi aw, Josef chu matheiloin keinawi nengin a um ni ngei a tih,” a tih a.
Chun, Jakob chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, saiip puon a dierkei a, ni sâwttak a naupa chu a sûn a.

A naupasalhai po po le a nau- nuhmeihai po po chu ama thlamuon dingin an tho a; nisienlakhawm, ama chun thlamuon a nuom nawh a, “Ni lo, lusûn pumin thlânah ka naupa kuomah ka fe ding a nih,” a tih a. Chuongchun, a pa chu ama ngaiin a ṭap hlak a.
Chun, Midian mihai chun Josef chu Aiguptaah Pharao hnuoia hotu pakhat, vêngtu pâwl hotu Potiphar kuoma chun an zâwr a.
